title: I have read Norwegian Wood and Kafka on the shore of Haruki Murakami. And I am already addicted to him. Which book of him should I read next? - Quora

response.answer_text: Try “Hard boiled wonderland and the end of the world” The wistfulness of “Norwegian Wood” and an amplification of the magical realism and mystery of “Kafka” together in one gently and genuinely entertaining book.
